name: This is my safe room
description:
Your job is to protect Gerald, who created you for that purpose. Fulfill it, for your pointless life now has purpose. Play forever!*

Controls:

Mouse: Aim, left click to shoot

Arrows/WASD: move

Esc: Escape

*don't know if I fixed it, but there was a bug that crashes the game at a somewhat obtainable score. Might have moved it farther instead. Its pretty freaky tbh.

Awesome music is by Fictum: https://fictium-sound-design.itch.io/

This was never meant for you, but please tell me in the comments if there's any way I can improve the game.
